org.gearvrf

Class GVRScene

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.GVRHybridObject
      • org.gearvrf.GVRScene
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class GVRScene
extends GVRHybridObject
    The scene graph

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GVRScene(GVRContext gvrContext)
      Constructs a scene with a camera rig holding left & right cameras in it.

      • getSceneObjects

        public java.util.List<GVRSceneObject> getSceneObjects()
        The top-level scene objects.
        Returns:
        A read-only list containing all the 'root' scene objects (those that were added directly to the scene).
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • getMainCameraRig

        public GVRCameraRig getMainCameraRig()
        Returns:
